name: Don't Panic and Eat Ice Cream
name_original: Don't Panic and Eat Ice Cream
description:
Get to your car before your ice cream melts in this ridic heat! However, the parking lot is full of the same red car; popular model, you've got good taste. Remember, Don't Panic and Eat Ice Cream.

Controller, mouse and keyboard support available. Usual WASD controls Shift to run, space to jump. On a Xbox controller, usual FPS controls with Y to jump and A to interact. 

Thanks for playing. And thank you @SideFX. 

This team consisted of only me, so it's definitely lacking polish, but I hope you have fun either way. 

-Team Name: Steve

-Game Name: Don't Panic and Eat Ice Cream

-Contact person name and email address: Steven Seung and qedseung@gmail.com

-How was Houdini used in your game's development? 

Houdini was used to simulate and create the melting VFX of the ice cream and to procedurally place car prefabs to make a "parking lot".

-Besides Houdini, what other tools did you use and what did you use them for? 

Unity

-List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission: Low Poly Cars from Unity Asset Store
